snippet.title: Saddies: Attack!! - Gameplay Trailer [Modoka]
snippet.description:
Choose your weapon against endless waves of "Saddies" as the war continues. Guard yourself with power-ups, and strike when the time is right in this arcade game for Android devices. Become more powerful by collecting the right power-ups. Be sure to get a higher score than your previous try, and be the sole survivor, in a quest to defend your soul. Tilt your Android device left and right to avoid dangerous beams fired by the "Saddie" armies, and shoot back with touching your screen!

Production by Adam Ryder
http://modokastudios.com/app/saddies-attack
